other_title: Shin Chō Kyō Ryo: Condor Hero (Japanese)
神鵰侠侶 コンドルヒーロー (Japanese)
plot: Yōka is a young 13-year-old boy. One day, his uncle, Kakusei, has him follow in his steps of martial arts and has him study the art of Zenshinkyou. After being mistreated, Yōka runs away Zenshinkyou. He stumbles on a Forbidden Tomb where he finds a beautiful young woman, by the name of Shōryūjo. After a short time, Yōka is eventually accepted by Shōryūjo to study the techniques of the Koboha under her, and thus begins their adventure through martial arts and love.
